3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest;

5 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;

16 class ResponseFormatter {
17 
25  public function get($objects, $pages = null) {
26  $objects = $this->getDatas ( $objects );
27  return $this->format ( [ "datas" => $objects,"count" => \sizeof ( $objects ) ] );
28  }
29 
37  public function getDatas($objects, &$classname = null) {
38  $objects = \array_map ( function ($o) use (&$classname) {
39  return $this->cleanRestObject ( $o, $classname );
40  }, $objects );
41  return \array_values ( $objects );
42  }
43 
44  public function getJSONDatas($datas) {
45  return $this->toJson ( $this->getDatas ( $datas ) );
46  }
47 
55  public function cleanRestObject($o, &$classname = null) {
56  $o = $o->_rest;
57  foreach ( $o as $k => $v ) {
58  if (isset ( $v->_rest )) {
59  $o [$k] = $v->_rest;
60  }
61  if (\is_array ( $v )) {
62  foreach ( $v as $index => $values ) {
63  if (isset ( $values->_rest ))
64  $v [$index] = $this->cleanRestObject ( $values );
65  }
66  $o [$k] = $v;
67  }
68  }
69  return $o;
70  }
71 
78  public function getOne($object) {
79  return $this->format ( [ "data" => $this->cleanRestObject ( $object ) ] );
80  }
81 
88  public function format($arrayResponse) {
89  return \json_encode ( $arrayResponse );
90  }
91 
98  public function getModel($controllerName) {
99  $array = \explode ( "\\", $controllerName );
100  $result = \ucfirst ( end ( $array ) );
101  if (UString::endswith ( $result, "s" )) {
102  $result = \substr ( $result, 0, - 1 );
103  }
104  return $result;
105  }
106 
113  public function toJson($data) {
114  return \json_encode ( $data );
115  }
116 
123  public function formatException($e) {
124  $error = new RestError ( @$e->getCode (), \utf8_encode ( $e->getMessage () ), @$e->getTraceAsString (), @$e->getFile (), 500 );
125  return $this->format ( $error->asArray () );
126  }
127 
128  public static function toXML($data, &$xml_data) {
129  foreach ( $data as $key => $value ) {
130  if (is_numeric ( $key )) {
131  $key = 'item' . $key; // dealing with <0/>..<n/> issues
132  }
133  if (is_array ( $value )) {
134  $subnode = $xml_data->addChild ( $key );
135  self::toXML ( $value, $subnode );
136  } else {
137  $xml_data->addChild ( "$key", htmlspecialchars ( "$value" ) );
138  }
139  }
140  }
141 }
